game.description: Defeat the Dark Sorcerer Xandros and save the kingdom of Eldoria from his dark magic.
game.objective: Defeat Xandros in battle and return to the kingdom with his magical artifact, the Scepter of Shadows.
game.quest_giver: Elder Sage Eriol, located in the town of Willowdale
game.reward: A powerful magical amulet that grants resistance to dark magic, and 100 gold pieces

tasks.description: Find Xandros' lair, a dark tower on the outskirts of the forest of Elvendom.
tasks.location: Forest of Elvendom, northwest of Willowdale
tasks.objective: Gather information about Xandros' plans and weaknesses

tasks.description: Infiltrate Xandros' lair and gather intelligence on his dark magic rituals.
tasks.location: Dark Tower, located in the Forest of Elvendom
tasks.objective: Disable Xandros' ritual to summon a powerful demon

tasks.description: Defeat Xandros in battle and retrieve the Scepter of Shadows.
tasks.objective: Kill Xandros and shatter his dark magic spell

game.title: The Shadow Sorcerer's Downfall
